amendatorysection.catchline: District; recreation area; regulate vehicle traffic; violation; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: A district may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations governing vehicle traffic in a recreation area as provided in the Nebraska Rules of the Road. Any person who violates any such rule or regulation shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Rules of the Road, see section 60-601.
